stimulusHtml: The Taylor polynomial of degree 100 for the function f about x = 3 is given by  P ( x ) = ( x − 3 ) 2 − ( x − 3 ) 4 2 ! + ( x − 3 ) 6 3 ! + ⋯ + ( − 1 ) n + 1 ( x − 3 ) 2 n n ! + ⋯ − ( x − 3 ) 100 50 ! MathType@MTEF@5@5@@6F0A@ . What is the value of f (30) (3) ?
